FuncDef:
The flow-bill command enables the system to collect the statistics about the total traffic volume of a domain.
The undo flow-bill command stops collecting the statistics about the total traffic volume of a domain.
By default, the system does not collect the statistics about the total traffic volume of a domain.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the flow-bill command is run, the traffic in the domain is periodically backed up to the local bill. You can run the display local-bill command to view the stored traffic.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
